entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
